span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 全景的： "a complete view,"
【例】 a panorama of American history 美国历史总览
【近】 compendious, complete, comprehensive, cyclopedic, embracive, exhaustive, thorough, in-depth
【反】 narrow 狭窄的
【记】 from pan- "all" + Greek horama "sight, spectacle, that which is seen,"
